main event: A witness observed a bright, fast-moving object crossing overhead in Nigeria on 2 April 1966.
interesting points: The object was noted to blink very brightly at a rate of about two times per second.,The witness had over 4,000 hours of flying experience, implying credibility.,The witness reported there was no sound at all from the object.,The object was compared to the size of a satellite but appeared much brighter when directly overhead.,The witness expressed uncertainty that the object was a known satellite or aircraft.
witness description: Bob Bailey, a member of the Sudan Interior Mission with extensive flying experience
